data.eml:eml: A new whitefly genus and species, Himalayaleyrodes sarcococcae Dubey (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) infesting Christmas box (Buxaceae) in Western Himalaya, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dubey, Anil Kumar, Singh, Sudhir (2017): A new whitefly genus and species, Himalayaleyrodes sarcococcae Dubey (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) infesting Christmas box (Buxaceae) in Western Himalaya, India. Zootaxa 4269 (4): 531-544, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4269.4.7
